forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the twilight settles over Downtown San Francisco, a serene hush blankets the city. The clear skies, punctuated by the evening star, usher in a cool night. With temperatures dipping into the high 40s and a gentle breeze whispering from the west, it’s an invitation to wrap yourself in something warm but light. A cozy sweater will serve well against the evening chill, whether you're strolling along the Embarcadero or settling in for a quiet night at home.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, the promise of a mostly sunny Saturday unfolds, although the afternoon may bring a slight dip in temperatures. Expect the day to radiate with soft sunlight, coaxing the city into vibrant activity. For those seeking a delightful outing, a leisurely walk through Golden Gate Park or an exploration of the local arts scene seems fitting. Just keep a light jacket handy, for the usual San Francisco breeze will accompany the warmth of the day, ensuring a pleasant, balanced experience. Embrace the beauty of the Bay, where the clarity of a sunlit morning melds seamlessly into the intimacy of a calm evening.
